reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 274/03: EXEMPTION - MOBILE ELECTRICITY GENERATORS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 274/03: EXEMPTION - MOBILE ELECTRICITY GENERATORS
reg_info.act_under: Environmental Protection Act   Loi sur la protection de l’environnement

content.content: 1. (1) The Act does not apply to the mobile electricity generators referred to in subsection (2) in respect of any requirement or prohibition that relates to the discharge of sound. O. Reg. 274/03, s. 1 (1). (2) Subsection (1) applies to mobile electricity generators arranged for by the Ontario Electricity Financial Corporation for the provision of up to 410 megawatts of short-term temporary electricity capacity to meet peak demand, as described in the order made under section 3.2 of the Environmental Assessment Act and approved by Order in Council 1267/2003. O. Reg. 274/03, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Act does not apply to the mobile electricity generators referred to in subsection (2) in respect of any requirement or prohibition that relates to the discharge of sound. O. Reg. 274/03, s. 1 (1).

(2) Subsection (1) applies to mobile electricity generators arranged for by the Ontario Electricity Financial Corporation for the provision of up to 410 megawatts of short-term temporary electricity capacity to meet peak demand, as described in the order made under section 3.2 of the Environmental Assessment Act and approved by Order in Council 1267/2003. O. Reg. 274/03, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 274/03, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 274/03, s. 2.
